title: Health Systems Science Practice-Based Project Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Individual device utilization, practice-oriented team projects, and community-linked practicum opportunities

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of health systems (medical services, social support systems, etc.) by analyzing real cases
Learners can establish and implement personalized health management plans based on patient data
Learners can efficiently manage and analyze patient information using electronic medical record (EMR) systems
Learners can collaborate with healthcare team members to propose system improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
